trans-unit.source: Defines constants that inform <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*> about how it should validate a container's child controls.
trans-unit.target: 定义常数，用于通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*>有关应如何验证容器的子控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A> will validate all enabled controls in a container, such as a form.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>将验证容器，如窗体中的所有已启用的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to restrict the types of controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于限制的类型的控件其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: You can combine these enumerated values together with a bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以组合这些枚举的值以及按位或运算。

trans-unit.source: Combining parameters with a bitwise OR operator will result in a logical AND operation.
trans-unit.target: 将与按位 OR 运算符结合使用参数将导致逻辑与运算。

trans-unit.source: For example, calling `ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)` will only raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event on controls that are both immediate children of the container AND are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，调用`ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)`将只会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>的这两个直属子对象的容器并且已启用的控件上的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify ImmediateChildren when you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>, the method will require that you validate all child controls in the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在调用时不指定 ImmediateChildren <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>，该方法将需要验证控件层次结构中的所有子控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 验证的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that are directly hosted within the container.
trans-unit.target: 验证直接承载在容器内的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Does not validate any of the children of these children.
trans-unit.target: 不会验证任何这些子级的子级。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that contains a custom <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref>, and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref>, using ImmediateChildren will cause the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref> to occur, but not the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>包含一个自定义<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref>，使用 ImmediateChildren 将导致<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref>发生，但不是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Validates all child controls, and all children of these child controls, regardless of their property settings.
trans-unit.target: 验证所有子控件和这些子控件，而不考虑其属性设置的所有子级。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 验证可以选择的子控件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*> value set, which means that the user can navigate to the control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 验证具有的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>值集，这意味着用户可以导航到使用 TAB 键的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 验证的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
